entries.title: Clean API design

entries.title: OutputBag asyncio.Lock protects concurrent writes
entries.description: The async write() method in OutputBag is properly protected by asyncio.Lock(), preventing race conditions during concurrent writes. Multiple parallel stages can safely write to OutputBag without corrupting state.
entries.evidence: Stress tests with 20 parallel writers writing 10 outputs each (200 total writes) completed successfully with no data corruption or inconsistent state.

entries.title: ContextSnapshot handles 200MB+ payloads successfully
entries.description: Successfully serialized and deserialized a 209MB ContextSnapshot with 10000 messages and 100 documents
entries.evidence: Test with 10,000 messages (10KB each) and 100 documents (100KB each) completed successfully
